Class Setup

java.lang.Object
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.Setup
public class Setup extends Object
Class to load and store all settings relating to the simulation.

    • read

      public static void read() throws IOException
      Reads the setup files and sets the fields accordingly. TODO: Improve error handling and include a default setup file.
      Throws:
      IOException - when the setup file directories are incorrect
